Flow.description:
Flow Description: Flow to Work (Progress) Existing Opportunities. The main flow that houses subflow's like Create Pre-Approval or Bond / Work Opportunity - Bond etc
Front-End Access: Work Opportunity button on the Opportunity page.
H2 = Separation of concern from H1 development that is already Live in Prod.

formulas.name: Link_Bond
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!bondOppIdVar} , "Click here to Navigate to the Bond Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: Link_PreApproval
formulas.expression: HYPERLINK("/" & {!paIdOppVar} , "Click here to Navigate to the Pre-Approval Opportunity" , '_top')

formulas.name: outstandingDocsMain
formulas.expression: IF({!mainMissingID} = "ID", "ID"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingPayslip} = "Payslip", "Payslip"+ BR(), null) + IF({!mainMissingBankS} = "Bank Statement", "Bank Statement"+ BR(), null)

Flow.label: Wrap Up Opportunity H2

fields.name: areYouSure
fields.fieldText: Are you sure you want to convert into a Bond Opportunity?

fields.name: errorCoAppMissing
fields.fieldText:
The Main Applicant's martial status has been captured as Married (COP), however there is no Co-applicant/spouse associated with the applicant.


A co-applicant must be added in order to progress with this opportunity.


Please select "Add Co-Applicant" to continue:

fields.name: errorCreditCheck
fields.fieldText:
The Credit check conducted on the Main Applicant has returned a RED outcome.


A pre-approval opportunity cannot continue while the main applicant has a poor credit status.


Please select Close Opportunity to close this pre-approval opportunity as "Closed Lost - Poor Credit"

fields.name: errorRole_0
fields.fieldText: A Verification is in progress. You are not able to work the opportunity until the verification has been completed:

fields.name: errorRole_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: A Verification is in progress. You are not able to work the opportunity until the verification has been completed:

fields.name: error_BondInProgressGen
fields.fieldText:
An associated Bond Opportunity is in progress: {!Link_Bond}


You are not able to work the General Opportunity.

fields.name: paMsg
fields.fieldText:
An associated Bond Opportunity is in progress: {!Link_Bond}


You are not able to work the Pre-Approval Opportunity.

fields.name: faultMessage_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You do not have the necessary permissions to work this opportunity.


Please navigate to Create Manual Opportunity and Convert for the Existing Customer.

fields.name: faultMessage_0_0_0
fields.fieldText:
You do not have the necessary permissions to work this opportunity.


Please contact your System Administrator to ensure that your User is linked to the following Permission sets:

  • Mortgage
  • Financial Services Cloud Standard

fields.name: closedGen
fields.fieldText:
The General Opportunity Stage is Closed and cannot be worked.


Please create a repeat General Opportunity from Create Manual Opportunity > Convert Existing Customer.

fields.name: reopenClosedOpp_0
fields.fieldText:
Would you like to move {!Get_Opportunity.Name} out of Rehab?


Current Stage: {!Get_Opportunity.StageName}

Current Status: {!Get_Opportunity.Status__c}


New Stage: Working

New Status: Awaiting Consent

fields.name: minRequiredDocs
fields.fieldText:
Main Applicant

Min Required Documents - ID, Payslip, Bank Statement

fields.name: outcomeRequired
fields.fieldText: The Call Outcome field is required.

fields.name: manualSLAtxt
fields.fieldText: You have the option to set Manual SLA's for this Opportunity until a automated workflow rule is made available by a Stage change or until the Close off Days on the workflow rule is reached.

validationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to set the follow up prior to the current date/time.
You are not allowed to set the follow up prior to the current date/time.

fields.name: callBackDTRequired
fields.fieldText: The Call Back Date Time field is required.

fields.name: wrapUpRequired
fields.fieldText: The Wrap Up Comment field is required.

value.stringValue: Upload OTP - Convert to Bond Opportunity
Upload OTP - Convert to Bond Opportunity

fields.name: errorRole_0_0
fields.fieldText:
An associated Pre-Approval Opportunity is in progress: {!Link_PreApproval}


Would you like to update {!Get_Opportunity.Name} with the following stage and status and Convert to a Bond:

  • New Stage: Bond
  • New Status: OTP received

The Pre-Approval Opportunity will be auto closed.

A new Bond Opportunity will be created for {!Get_Opportunity.Name}

value.stringValue: Upload OTP - Convert to Bond Opportunity
